insecure.description: Disable certificate verification of API calls

data_node.description: Defines whether elasticsearch node can hold data

elastic_instance_id.description: Instance ID for elastic node. Depends on cloud provider

elastic_node_memory.description: Amount of memory (MB) per elasticsearch node

elastic_zone_count.description: Number of availability zones in selected region

ingest_node.description: Defines whether elasticsearch node can run an ingest pipeline

master_node.description: Defines whether elasticsearch node can be elected master

ml_node.description: Defines whether elasticsearch node can run Machine Learning jobs

name.description: A name for the deployment; otherwise this will be the generated deployment id

region.description: Geographic area where the data center of the cloud provider that hosts your deployment is located

template_id.description: Unique identifier of the deployment template - pre-configure the components of the Elastic Stack
